name: CookiePreferencesForm-0ippk-1703497183086

description.llm: A component that allows users to manage their cookie preferences, including options to accept or decline various types of cookies such as necessary, analytics, and marketing. This form should include switches or checkboxes for each cookie category, a 'Select All' option, and buttons to save or cancel the user's choices.

components.name: checkbox
components.usage: To let users toggle each cookie category individually.

components.name: button
components.usage: To submit the user's preferences or cancel and close the form.

components.name: toggle
components.usage: To provide a 'Select All' option for users to quickly accept or decline all cookie categories.

components.name: card
components.usage: To encapsulate the form elements and provide a structured and visually appealing layout.

components.name: dialog
components.usage: To display the form as a modal, ensuring the user's attention and action is required before proceeding.
